seo.title: Dashboard - EbookFy
seo.description: See your summary, PDF history, and account details.

alerts.freePlanTitle: You have 1 free eBook per month
alerts.freePlanMessageUsed: You have already used {{used}} of 1 free eBook this month.

account.title: Account information
account.languageHelp: This choice sets the platform language and is saved to your account.

whitelist.title: Unlimited usage whitelist
whitelist.description: Anyone on this list can create unlimited eBooks (no watermark, with AI).

plans.subscriptionHelp: All plans are monthly subscriptions. You can cancel anytime in Account > Manage subscription.
plans.moreDetails: Want to see more details? Visit the full plans page.

messages.missingSubscription: You don't have an active subscription yet. Choose a plan to get started.
messages.portalError: We couldn't open the subscription portal. Try again.
messages.whitelistSuccess: Email added to the whitelist successfully!
messages.whitelistError: Failed to add the email to the whitelist.
